Text:
Thank You !
One of the best Bond films ever in my mind. :)

I see you don't get much written appreciation, and HD Audio Rips are what I, personally, have been waiting for. 
A little thanks goes a long way, and its free :)

Thanks again for these great rips. :)

Thanks, mate! :)

Well, when I look around it looks like it's quite common that Downloaders doesn't give a Thank You comment or whatever to the Uploaders. 

But I agree - It doesn't take much of your time to write a Thank You and the Downloaders should know that the Uploaders really appreciate when you guys give Thanks! :)
BTW, matey, 'Goldfinger' is my all time Bond film and it always will be ;) but 'Skyfall' definitely is a great flick!

Thank you very much for your hard work.
best audio and best video.

From now on I will only download movies from you for my collection .
Thanks in advance

@josephnguyen:

Wow thanks man, you're words is really appreciated! :)
